plot: A country boy from Vermont travels to the "big city" to make his fortune and prove to the people back home that he's not the stupid hick that they think he is.
title: Alejandro, el Grande
plot_es: A country boy from Vermont travels to the "big city" to make his fortune and prove to the people back home that he's not the stupid hick that they think he is.
plot_en: A country boy from Vermont travels to the "big city" to make his fortune and prove to the people back home that he's not the stupid hick that they think he is.
